title: Ending CPAC Stage Lie | Guests: Matt Schlapp & Rep. Lauren Boebert | 3/3/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Texas Gov. Abbott’s decision to completely open the state and rescind the mask mandate. Rep. Lauren Boebert joins to review her new op-ed, “If I Were a Democrat”, and the new H.R.1 Bill trying to radically change voting laws. Glenn puts to rest the left’s lies and rumors about CPAC’s stage design as American Conservative Union Chairman Matt Schlapp joins with the full story. Newton County, Missouri official David Osborn joins to explain the county’s Second Amendment Preservation Act. The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins talks the Great Reset, ESG scores, and the radicalization of America’s banks. Andrew Cuomo’s approval ratings are sinking fast.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
